info.name: Windows 10 CU Theme
info.description:
This is a minimal dark Metro theme for Firefox on Windows 10 CU! Perfectly complete the metro UI immersion while not loosing any functionality. It is made to perfectly match the metro UI with the Windows 10 CU color of #3F3F3F.

Screenshots here: http://imgur.com/a/a9p0D
info.additionalInfo: This is an adaption of http://maxxdogg.deviantart.com/art/Windows-10-Firefox-Theme-550451443 and https://userstyles.org/styles/135593/firefox-edge-light-dark with all colors and many elements changed. This will not interfere with any websites as it only changes the Firefox UI. The tab close button is removed in this theme for simplicity. Tabs can be closed with a triple or MMB click. There is a known error when tabs overflow with pinned tabs, the pinned tabs become invisible. This theme is still under production and I will update it as I learn more and progress (between taking college courses of course).
